overview:
Easy Scan Pvt Ltd is Indiaâ€™s leading provider of Portable Scanning Solutions.

Easy Scan is originally developed for students and educational institutions. Through Easy Scan, we have simplified the scanning process and made possible to covert the text book into digital format in more efficient manner.

Also our scanner does not require any computer or external power source for scanning process, so it can add immense value to large enterprises who want to deploy scanning at the field level.
